level.heading: Preliminary capital budget and multiyear capital improvements plan.
level.text: On or before January 10 of each year, the Mayor shall transmit to the Council a preliminary capital budget for the next fiscal year and a preliminary multiyear capital improvements plan.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90-day) addition of § 47-339.1 [1981 Ed.], see §§ 2(d) and 3(d) of the Fiscal Year 2001 Budget Support Second Emergency Amendment Act of 2000 (D.C. Act 13-393, August 14, 2000, 47 DCR 7032).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-126, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-336.
